entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-09-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Fuzzlyn: Assertion failed 'otherTargetInterval->registerType == TYP_DOUBLE' during 'LSRA allocate' #108000
  • Be consistent about caching behavior of function resolutions through IDynamicInterfaceCastable #107999
    10.0.0
  • JsonElement.ToString() returns invalid json: "True"/"False" #107998
  • Should stack traces collected in filters have managed EH frames in them? #107995
    9.0.0
  • System.Diagnostics.Process.Kill(entireProcessTree: true) doesn't kill entire tree if an intermediate child process is in job object with JOB_OBJECT_LIMIT_KILL_ON_JOB_CLOSE #107992
  • failure in System.Numerics.Tests.op_rightshiftTest.LargeNegativeBigIntegerShiftTest #107990
  • Consider using Linux's getrandom in minipal_get_cryptographically_secure_random_bytes #107989
    Future
  • [WASI] failing System.Net.Sockets tests #107981
    10.0.0
  • [browser] Consider DangerousAddRef for JSObject #107974
    10.0.0
  • Potential memory leak in ep_file_write_event error path #107970
  • Test failure: System.Net.Quic.Tests.QuicStreamTests.TestStreams #107969
  • Serializing source-generated nullable init-only properties throws when using RespectNullableAnnotations #107968
    9.0.0
  • How to handle "The entry point exited without ever building an IHost" #107991
  • [API Proposal]: Add Message property to ExperimentalAttribute #107963
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Add System.Text.Json.Nodes.JsonArray.Remove(All|Range) #107962
    10.0.0

Closed

  • .NET Framework DLL can't use at .NET 9 when VB.NET My.Resources Used BinaryFormatter #107967
  • Remove IVT from System.Collections.Immutable #107848
    Future
  • .netframework4.7.2 Problem with webrequest asynchronous request #107835
  • ClientWebSocket ignores ContentType Option #1035
  • Port System.Threading.Tasks docs for .NET 9 APIs #105985
    9.0.0
  • Fuzzlyn: Assertion failed 'block->PrevIs(bPrev)' during 'Optimize control flow' #107920
    9.0.0
  • DSAOpenSsl doest suuport in SslStreamCertificateContext #107977
  • Unable to load library published with PublishAot #107971
    Future
  • [help]NET 8 from Xamarin.Mac, there is a problem writing to NAS. #106448
    Future
  • TensorPrimitives.Exp<double> returns negative infinity instead of 0 for doubles between approximately -709.5 and -709.7 #107838
    9.0.0
  • [wasm] Compiled regexes in interpreter ~25-50x regression #99553
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • JIT: Don't expand virtual calls too early for minopts #108002
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/9.0] Treat -rtm as stable sdk version band #107997
    area-Build-mono, area-Workloads
  • Improve Random{NumberGenerator}.GetItems/String for non-power of 2 choices #107988
    area-System.Security, cryptographic-docs-impact
  • Enable GC double reporting detection #107986
    area-GC-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Fix SG nullability annotations for required and init properties. #107985
    area-System.Text.Json, 10.0.0
  • [mono][interp] Remove mono_basic_block_split #107980
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • More doc updates for source-of-truth assemblies #107965
    area-Extensions-Options
  • Add missing params to WhenEach overloads #107964
    area-System.Threading.Tasks

Merged

  • Remove JitGenericHandleCache #106843
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Fix see crefs #107996
    area-Extensions-Hosting
  • [WASI] ownsPollable parameter to RegisterWasiPollable, downgrade dependencies #107978
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-wasi, 10.0.0
  • Update configure.h.in #107954
    area-Host
  • Remove InternalsVisibleTo from System.Collections.Immutable. #107872
    area-System.Collections, 10.0.0
  • Fix spelling error #107994
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection
  • Add missing docs for Task API #107951
    area-System.Threading.Tasks
  • JIT: Update lexical pointers after compacting blocks in `fgUpdateFlowGraph` #107924
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Support class target in RUC/RDC code fixers #107956
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Cleanup delegate-related code #107966
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [LoongArch64] Fixed DBG_DebugBreak stub for missing return instruction. #107973
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • [RISC-V] Fixed DBG_DebugBreak stub #107972
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • WebSocket Feedback Follow-up #107662
    area-System.Net
  • Replace VectorXx.Exp's edge case fallback with scalar processing #107886
    area-System.Numerics, 9.0.0
  • [release/9.0-rc2] Mark the System.Formats.Nrbf assembly as [Experimental] with SYSLIB5005 #107950
    Servicing-approved, binaryformatter-migration, area-System.Formats.Nrbf

Updated

  • [release/9.0-rc2] Replace VectorXx.Exp's edge case fallback with scalar processing #107942
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Numerics, 9.0.0
  • Add DNMD into src/native #107961
    NO-MERGE, Hackathon, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure
  • Compile the minipal as an object and static library #107889
    area-Infrastructure
  • Target .NET 10 / net10.0 #106599
    area-Infrastructure
  • JIT: Extend jump tables #107831
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [workload] Fix the SDK band version and base the WBT on the sdk flow #107899
    needs-area-label
  • Move tools to use LKG ILC #107772
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • [WASI] sockets #106977
    arch-wasm, area-System.Net.Sockets, os-wasi, 10.0.0
  • Enable NuGet Audit and fix issues #107639
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • JIT: Visit blocks in RPO during LSRA #107927
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • add support of TLS 1.3 on macOS POC #104835
    area-System.Net.Security, os-mac-os-x
  • Implement Vector.AddSaturate/SubtractSaturate #107193
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Bump chrome for testing - linux: 128.0.6613.119, windows: 128.0.6613.120 #107504
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Implement ProcessStartInfo.InheritHandles for Windows #107836
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0] Fix compilation on ARM64 hosts #107921
    Servicing-consider, area-Infrastructure, 8.0.x
  • [RISC-V] Transfer arguments between calling conventions in shuffling thunks #107282
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Cleanup some code under FEATURE_STUBS_AS_IL #104731
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • Added JsonMarshal.GetRawUtf8PropertyName API and corresponding JsonProperty tests. #107784
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Add EventSource event method generation #107176
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, community-contribution
  • JIT: Extend escape analysis to account for arrays with non-gcref elements #104906
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • NativeAOT Thread Name #107943
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [mono] Set unwind table kind #107462
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono, 10.0.0
  • [browser] Increase timeout and clean up after failed attempts of launching browser when testing #107865
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser
  • Mitigate JsonObject performance regression. #107944
    area-System.Text.Json, 10.0.0
  • Implement Enumerable.Reverse(TSource[]) #107957
    area-System.Linq, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [release/9.0] Remove invalid assert in RSAOpenSsl #107952
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Security, 9.0.0
  • Clean up the notes on experimental APIs to simplify for maintenance #107959
    area-Meta, 10.0.0
  • [release/9.0-rc2] Update configure.h.in #107955
    Servicing-approved, area-Host, 9.0.0
